survey_brief: This survey aims to assess the current level of cybersecurity awareness and practices among employees in various organizations to identify potential gaps and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training from your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you receive cybersecurity training from your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity practices do you regularly follow? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Avoiding clicking on suspicious links or attachments
Using a VPN when accessing work remotely
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common practices. Ensure options are clear and actionable.

script.question_text: Which of the following cybersecurity practices do you regularly follow? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Avoiding clicking on suspicious links or attachments
Using a VPN when accessing work remotely

questions.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing attempt, malware, data breach) at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge incident exposure. Include 'I'm not sure' for respondents who may lack awareness.

script.question_text: Have you ever encountered a cybersecurity incident (e.g., phishing attempt, malware, data breach) at work?

questions.question_text: If you encountered a cybersecurity incident, how did you respond?
answer_options: Reported it to IT/security team immediately
I'm not sure what to do in such cases
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure response behavior. Include an option for respondents who are unsure.
